summary:
Changes the outfit and leveled lists of the Stormcloak soldiers.
this plugin aims to improve the gear of the soldiers.
descriptionHtml:
The same as my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47020/?]Imperial Uniform mod[/url].

[heading]Leveled lists formula[/heading]
The formula used by me is as follows:
Stormcloak Bear Officer armor 5%
Dragonborn DLC Nordic Carved Armor 5%

Eastmarch, Stormcloack soldier uniform 20%
Rift soldier uniform 20%
Pale soldier uniform 5%
Winterhold soldier uniform 5%

Simple iron armor 10%
Banded iron armor 10%
Steel armor 10%
Leather armor 10%

To decrease the feeling that all soldiers are clones, some of them will have a random chance of wearing an armored fur hood.

[heading]Requirements[/heading]
The official Dragonborn DLC.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13486/?]Winter is coming[/url]
author: thordir
